Returns: true if obj is an instance of ECFieldFp and the prime value match, false otherwise.
Parameters: Object: the object to be compared.
equals(java.lang.Object).Description: Compares this prime finite field for equality with the specified object.

getFieldSize().Description: Returns the field size in bits which is size of prime p for this prime finite field.

ECFieldFp(java.math.BigInteger).Description: Creates an elliptic curve prime finite field with the specified prime p.

getP().Description: Returns the prime p of this prime finite field.

hashCode().Description: Returns a hash code value for this prime finite field.

ClassDesc: This immutable class defines an elliptic curve (EC) prime finite field.
